teaRecipes.description: A crisp, bubbly drink that mixes Bai Mu Dan white tea with sparkling water and a touch of citrus.
ingredients: 3 ounces Bai Mu Dan tea (brewed and chilled)
teaRecipes.notes: Adjust sweetness by adding simple syrup or honey as needed.

teaRecipes.description: A vibrant Sencha Lemonade, this drink combines the earthy notes of Sencha green tea with the refreshing citrus kick of lemonade.
ingredients: 2 ounces Sencha green tea (brewed and chilled)
teaRecipes.notes: You can substitute honey with agave syrup for a vegan option.

teaRecipes.description: Darjeeling Iced Tea Punch is a tropical iced tea punch made with Darjeeling tea, pineapple juice, and a splash of rum.
ingredients: 4 ounces Darjeeling black tea (brewed and chilled)
teaRecipes.notes: To make it alcohol-free, simply omit the rum and add extra pineapple juice.

teaRecipes.description: A strong and malty Assam tea brewed with chai spices and topped with steamed milk for a warming, spiced latte.
teaRecipes.notes: Adjust the spices to your taste. For a more traditional approach, steep the spices with the tea leaves.

teaRecipes.description: Matcha Green Tea Smoothie is a creamy, nutrient-packed smoothie made with the powerful antioxidant-rich matcha green tea.
teaRecipes.notes: Use a plant-based milk such as almond or oat for a fully vegan smoothie.

teaRecipes.description: A simple yet refreshing iced green tea, infused with the delicate floral notes of Jasmine green tea.
teaRecipes.notes: Serve with a slice of lemon or mint leaves for a refreshing twist.

teaRecipes.description: A creamy iced latte made with bold Earl Grey black tea, milk, and a touch of vanilla syrup for sweetness.
teaRecipes.notes: You can use oat milk or almond milk for a dairy-free version.

teaRecipes.description: Chai Spiced Hot Chocolate blends the warmth of chai spices with the richness of hot chocolate for a comforting drink.
teaRecipes.notes: For a vegan version, use a plant-based milk like coconut milk and maple syrup as a sweetener.

teaRecipes.description: A vibrant, creamy iced matcha latte made with matcha powder, almond milk, and a touch of sweetness.
teaRecipes.notes: Try coconut milk for a richer, tropical flavor. For a sweeter taste, adjust the honey or syrup.

teaRecipes.description: A soothing hot black tea with a hint of lemon and honey, perfect for relaxation or a morning boost.
teaRecipes.notes: Add a touch of ginger for an extra kick and to promote digestion.

teaRecipes.description: This is a refreshing iced drink combining Earl Grey tea, lemonade, and a splash of honey or agave.
teaRecipes.notes: You can replace honey with agave syrup for a vegan version.

teaRecipes.description: A refreshing green tea drink with a zingy ginger kick, topped off with a sparkling soda.
teaRecipes.notes: For a refreshing twist, add mint leaves or cucumber slices.

teaRecipes.description: A creamy and aromatic latte with black tea and vanilla.

teaRecipes.description: A refreshing punch combining black tea with citrus flavors.
teaRecipes.notes: Add a splash of sparkling water for fizz.

teaRecipes.description: A cozy blend of black tea and warm spiced apple cider.
teaRecipes.notes: Serve warm and enjoy on a chilly day.

teaRecipes.description: A fruity iced tea with the sweetness of blackberries.
teaRecipes.notes: Substitute with blueberry syrup for a different flavor.

teaRecipes.description: A warm and comforting tea with the rich flavor of maple and a hint of cinnamon.
teaRecipes.notes: Pair with your favorite baked goods for a cozy treat.

teaRecipes.description: A floral and refreshing drink with rose and lemonade.
teaRecipes.notes: Use edible rose petals for garnish.

teaRecipes.description: A decadent blend of black tea and chocolate, perfect for dessert.
teaRecipes.notes: Top with whipped cream for extra indulgence.

teaRecipes.description: A zesty and refreshing drink with black tea and ginger.

teaRecipes.description: A sweet and creamy latte with the rich flavor of caramel.
teaRecipes.notes: Drizzle additional caramel on top for decoration.

teaRecipes.description: A refreshing mocktail with black tea, mint, and lime.
teaRecipes.notes: Add club soda for a fizzy version.

teaRecipes.description: A simple and soothing blend of black tea with honey and lemon.
teaRecipes.notes: Serve warm or iced depending on your preference.

teaRecipes.description: A warm and zesty tea with hints of orange and spices.
teaRecipes.notes: Pair with a cinnamon stick for added aroma.

teaRecipes.description: A fruity and tangy drink blending black tea with mixed berries and lemonade.
teaRecipes.notes: Use frozen berries for a slushy texture.
